template.name: lambda EXPR
template.description: new lambda expression

template.name: lambda BLOCK
template.description: new lambda block

template.name: lambda Function<T, R>
template.description: new lambda / R apply(T t)

template.name: lambda BiFunction<T, U, R>
template.description: new lambda / R apply(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda Supplier<T>
template.description: new lambda / T get()

template.name: lambda Consumer<T>
template.description: new lambda / void accept(T t)

template.name: lambda Predicate<T>
template.description: new lambda / test(T t)

template.name: lambda BinaryOperator<T>
template.description: new lambda / T apply(T t, T u)

template.name: lambda UnaryOperator<T>
template.description: new lambda / T apply(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-{}
template.description: PARAM = new lambda BLOCK

template.name: lambda ((returntype)()-())
template.description: PARAM = new lambda BLOCK

template.name: lambda ()-()
template.description: PARAM = new lambda EXP

template.name: lambda ()-{} BiFunction<T, U, R>
template.value: (left,right)-> {/*R apply(T t, U u)*/ $END$ return R; }
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / R apply(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-{} BinaryOperator<T>
template.value: (left,right)->{/*T apply(T t, T u)*/ $END$ return left+right;}
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / T apply(T t, T u)

template.name: lambda ()-{} Consumer<T>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / void accept(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-{} Function<T, R>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / R apply(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-{} Predicate<T>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / test(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-{} Supplier<T>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / T get()

template.name: lambda ()-{} UnaryOperator<T>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / T apply(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-() BiFunction<T, U, R>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / R apply(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-() BinaryOperator<T>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / T apply(T t, T u)

template.name: lambda ()-() Consumer<T>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / void accept(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-() Function<T, R>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / R apply(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-() Predicate<T>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / test(T t)

template.name: lambda ()-() Supplier<T>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / T get()

template.name: lambda ()-() UnaryOperator<T>
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / T apply(T t)

template.name: lambda BiPredicate<T, U>
template.description: new lambda / test(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda BiConsumer<T, U>
template.description: new lambda / void accept(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-{} BiConsumer<T, U>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / void accept(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-{} BiPredicate<T, U>
template.value: (left,right)-> {/*bool test(T t, U u)*/ $END$ return true; }
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / test(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-() BiConsumer<T, U>
template.value: (left,right)-> System.out.print(","+ left+right )$END$ /*void accept(T t, U u)*/
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / void accept(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda ()-() BiPredicate<T, U>
template.description: PARAM = new lambda / test(T t, U u)

template.name: lambda (X)-(X) Function
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / R apply(T t) / RETURN ARGUMENT

template.name: lambda (X)-(X==Y) Predicate
template.description: PARAM = EXPR new lambda / test(T t) / RETURN IF EQUAL SOME OBJECT

template.name: lambda comsumer EMPTY
template.description: new lambda / void accept(T t)
